üß† AI Summarize Demo

Input (Raw Meeting Notes)

Team meeting about Q4 planning. Sarah presented the marketing budget proposal for $50,000 to run ads across Google and Facebook. John suggested we could reallocate funds from the operations budget since we're under budget there. After discussion, everyone agreed this was the best approach. Finance team needs to approve by Friday. Mike will prepare the reallocation document. Launch date tentatively set for March 15th.

Output (AI Summary)

‚Ä¢ Q4 marketing budget discussed: $50K requested for Google/Facebook ads
‚Ä¢ Funding approved via reallocation from operations budget
‚Ä¢ Team consensus reached on budget proposal
‚Ä¢ Finance approval required by Friday
‚Ä¢ Mike assigned to prepare reallocation document
‚Ä¢ Tentative launch date: March 15th

‚úÖ Action Items Extraction Demo

Input (Meeting Notes)

Sprint planning meeting. John needs to complete the user authentication feature by Wednesday. Sarah will review the API documentation and provide feedback to the team. We need to schedule a follow-up meeting for next Tuesday at 2pm to review progress. Mike should prepare demo slides for the stakeholder presentation.

Output (Action Items)

‚òê John: Complete user authentication feature (Deadline: Wednesday)
‚òê Sarah: Review API documentation and provide team feedback
‚òê Team: Schedule follow-up meeting (Next Tuesday 2:00 PM)
‚òê Mike: Prepare demo slides for stakeholder presentation
‚òê All: Prepare progress updates for follow-up meeting

üìù Smart Formatting Demo

Input (Messy Notes)

client call with acme corp, discussed new contract, they want 20 percent discount we agreed to 10, delivery timeline 6 weeks, next meeting march 1st, need to send updated contract

Output (Formatted)

CLIENT MEETING - ACME CORP

CONTRACT DISCUSSION
   ‚Ä¢ Client requested 20% discount
   ‚Ä¢ Negotiated and agreed to 10% discount
   ‚Ä¢ Final pricing approved by both parties

TIMELINE & DELIVERABLES
   ‚Ä¢ Delivery Timeline: 6 weeks from contract signing
   ‚Ä¢ Target completion aligned with Q2 goals

NEXT STEPS
   ‚òê Send updated contract reflecting 10% discount
   ‚òê Schedule follow-up meeting: March 1st
   ‚òê Prepare detailed delivery timeline
   ‚òê Confirm resource allocation for project
